</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>On en profite pour définir les gradients et hessiennes qui nous seront utiles pour mettre en place la <strong>méthode de Newton</strong> et la <strong>méthode de Levenberg-Marquardt</strong>. On se concentre sur la fonction <em>de coût</em> quadratique.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">mk_nonlinreg</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">nonlinreg_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">wave_fun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">nonlinreg_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wave_grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])[:</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">wave_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">nonlinreg_hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wave_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wave_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wave_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">wave_hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hess1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'lm'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">identity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">hess2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">hess2</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">nonlinreg_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nonlinreg_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nonlinreg_hessian</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Implémentation-de-la-méthode-de-Gauss-Newton-et-de-Levenberg-Marquardt">Implémentation de la méthode de Gauss-Newton et de Levenberg-Marquardt<a class="anchor-link" href="#Implémentation-de-la-méthode-de-Gauss-Newton-et-de-Levenberg-Marquardt">¶</a></h3><p><a id="implem_lm"></a></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>On introduit maintenant la <strong>méthode de Newton</strong> et la méthode de <strong>Levenberg-Marquardt</strong>. Il s'agit simplement de modifier la direction de descente pour prendre en compte une information sur l'évolution de la direction de descente (codée par la Hessienne). Un bon moyen de comprendre pourquoi l'introduction de la hessienne est d'introduire les régularisations quadratiques suivantes :</p>
<ol>
<li>$f_1(x) = f(x^k) + \nabla f(x^k)(x-x^k) + \frac{1}{2 \alpha}\|x-x^k\|^2$  </li>
<li>$f_2(x) = f(x^k) + \nabla f(x^k)(x-x^k) + \frac{1}{2}(x-x^k)^T H(x^k) (x-x^k)$<br>
La minimisation de la première fonctionnelle donne la méthode de <strong>descente de gradient à pas fixe</strong> tandis que la seconde donne la <strong>méthode de Newton</strong>. Néanmoins on a besoin du fait que $H(x^k)$ soit une forme quadratique <em>positive</em>, ce qui est acquis si la fonction $f$ est convexe.</li>
</ol>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [25]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">newton_descent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hessian</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">dim</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">x_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">dim</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">f_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">error_point_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">error_grad_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">asarray</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">x_old</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
    <span class="n">grad_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">count</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">xrange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">M</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">method</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">mu</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">any</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">v</span><span class="o"><</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eig</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>
            <span class="n">count</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="n">descent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">descent</span>
        <span class="n">grad_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">f_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">x_list</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
        <span class="n">f_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f_x</span>
        <span class="n">error_point_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">x_old</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">error_grad_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">norm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grad_x</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="mi">1000</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"iter={}, x={}, f(x)={}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">))</span>

        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">error_point_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">|</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">error_grad_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="k">break</span>
        <span class="n">x_old</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
        
    <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"point error={}, grad error={}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">error_point_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">error_grad_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"number of negative eigenvalues={}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">count</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="s1">'x_list'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">x_list</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'f_list'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">f_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'error_point_list'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">error_point_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'error_point_list'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">error_point_list</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]}</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Dans notre application on compare les algorithmes de Newton ou quasi-Newton aux algorithmes de descente de gradient introduits plutôt.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_nonlinreg</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">x0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rnd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">true_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">lm_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'lm'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"true cond = {}, lm cond = {}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cond</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">true_hessian</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cond</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lm_hessian</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">error_point</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">error_grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">h</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">3</span>
<span class="n">iterations</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10000</span>

<span class="n">result_newton</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newton_descent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">result_lm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newton_descent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'lm'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">result_wolfe</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">steepest_descent_wolfe</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'x_list'</span><span class="p">][:,</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_wolfe</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"Newton parameters = {}, Levenberg-Marquardt parameters = {}, Wolfe parameters = {}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">newton_wave_fun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">lm_wave_fun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">wolfe_wave_fun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_wave</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'o'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'data'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'r-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'signal'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">newton_wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'c-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Newton'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lm_wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'g-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Levenberg'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wolfe_wave_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'b-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Wolfe'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'$\mathrm{Data \ with \ outliers}$'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'x'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'text'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">usetex</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'font'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>

zJDiIK11qtZ6g23Wz4gYhBBCGNw6SGudpLXuX/UuQAh3pJQKqzI/XikVKc+61F013+VS29/pxkTk
udyyiaj8uFxHflyuYXumZb3TfBigbS3cipRSwwwLrpmp+l3azFBK7QFyDAipWVNKTbe9ljotq/U5
1O2SgPy4XE5+XC5g+//o/B1OAops02bkocdaq+a7BJhmKxXYbERMzZUtoW6y1cGGKKXG1vUc6nZJ

H5dwe1rr5bYr1yCl1Fij42kubPWqa2yzw4Ed1PEc6o5JQLiQ/LhcyvnZlUIg0DbtD+Q3fTgtg608
+xbbbD7Wq1lRB7YioMz6NLJxxyQgPy4XkR+XyzkXB63jt+8zBEhr+nCaNefvcju/fX+hWK9mRd1E

HQkkU4dzaKN1G9EQSqlpQC4Q7FTeJerB1jS0AOt3udzoeIQQrmM76a/DevUfAEy0dc1T63OoWyYB

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>On constate que la méthode de Newton échoue. En effet, la forme quadratique mise en jeu n'est pas <em>positive</em>.<br>
<strong>ATTENTION</strong> : le pas choisi est assez grand et la méthode de Newton peut diverger. Essayer avec un pas plus petit pour réduire le problème.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Complément-:-test-sur-le-problème-de-régression-linéaire">Complément : test sur le problème de régression linéaire<a class="anchor-link" href="#Complément-:-test-sur-le-problème-de-régression-linéaire">¶</a></h3><p><a id="linreg"></a></p>
<p>En complément, on montre que la méthode de Gauss-Newton converge bien dans le cas où la fonction que l'on cherche à interpoler est convexe en les paramètres. C'est le cas de la fonction linéaire $f: \ x \mapsto ax+b$ où les paramètres sont $a$ et $b$. On reprend la même étude que précédemment.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [27]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">b</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">lin_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ones</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,:]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">grad</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">lin_hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_hessian</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">mk_linreg</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">linreg_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">lin_fun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">linreg_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])[:</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">linreg_hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'newton'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">lin_hessian</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hess1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'lm'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">identity</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">hess2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">hess1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">hess2</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">linreg_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linreg_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linreg_hessian</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [28]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">3</span>
<span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">b</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">noise</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span>

<span class="n">x_min</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="n">x_max</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">20</span>
<span class="n">n_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">50</span>

<span class="n">x_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linspace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_min</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x_max</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_data</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">x_train</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">noise</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">rnd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">randn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'o'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'data'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'r-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'signal'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'$\mathrm{Data \ with \ outliers}$'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'x'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'text'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">usetex</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'font'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_linreg</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">error_point</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">error_grad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">h</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">iterations</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1000</span>
<span class="n">x0</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rnd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">result_newton</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newton_descent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">result_lm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newton_descent</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hess</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">method</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'lm'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mu</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">result_wolfe</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">steepest_descent_wolfe</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">iterations</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_point</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">error_grad</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'x_list'</span><span class="p">][:,</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">result</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_wolfe</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s2">"Newton parameters = {}, Levenberg-Marquardt parameters = {}, Wolfe parameters = {}"</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">newton_lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">newton_lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">newton_lin_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_newton</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">lm_lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lm_lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lm_lin_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_lm</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">wolfe_lin_fun</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wolfe_lin_grad</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wolfe_lin_hessian</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mk_lin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">param_wolfe</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'o'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'data'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'r-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'signal'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">newton_lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'c-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Newton'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lm_lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'g-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Levenberg'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wolfe_lin_fun</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_train</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s1">'b-'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Wolfe'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'$\mathrm{Data \ with \ outliers}$'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'x'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'text'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">usetex</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'font'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
